page.title: 10A Life in the Day of Andrea
page.content: My name is Andrea.I am ten years old and live with my parents,five sisters and three brothers.I have a dog and a budgie.I wake up on weekdays at half past seven and get up at eight o'clock,get dressed and then have my breakfast.When I have fed my pets,I start my journey down to school.I cross the road and go down the mountain.When I get to school I hang my coat in the cloakroom and then enter the classroom.We do Maths and English in the mornings and different types of work in the afternoon.The bell goes for hometime at half past three.I get home about four o'clock.I go in and change and then play in the street.I go in at about half past nine and watch telly for about an hour.When i go to bed I usually read for a while and go to sleep about eleven.
